overview_of_class: For heritage speakers. Communicative method. Further development of vocabulary, grammar, speaking and writing skills through readings and short films. Offered in fall only.
name: Accelerated Intermediate Spanish for Heritage Language Learners
title: WCAS SPANISH 127-0-22 Accelerated Intermediate Spanish for Heritage Language Learners

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: For heritage speakers. Communicative method. Further development of vocabulary, grammar, speaking and writing skills through readings and short films. Offered in fall only.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Three class meetings a week.
Outside online video program twice a week.
Prerequisite: AP score of 3 or online Spanish Language Placement Exam.
No P/N
Attendance at first class is required.

subject: SPANISH
